text:
We decided to try the Mango Sorbet and Belgian Chocolate Gelato. They were quite expensive for one scoop each.
The two flavors had notably different levels of sweetness; the mango sorbet was overwhelmingly sweet, whereas the chocolate gelato struck a perfect balance between the bitterness of dark chocolate and the richness of cocoa.
The absence of a seating area was quite a bummer! :o
If you're someone who doesn't favor exceedingly sweet treats, I'd suggest avoiding the Mango Sorbet and opting for the chocolate Belgian gelato instead :P
This coffee n cake corner is located at B2 of Terminal 3 (next to foodcourt). The setting is cosy and is ideal for friendly catch up meeting.
Nice flavours. Tried the bubblegum and Belgian dark chocolate. My kids love it.
